content.rendered:
Directed by Howy Parkins.

Written by Deborah Copeland. Devin Bunje. Karen Graci. Nick Stanton.

Cast Manny Jacinto (Scott). Gary Anthony Williams (Beta). Joy Osmanski (Sunny)

Language English.

Producers Devin Bunje. Howy Parkins. Nick Stanton. Wade Wisinski.

Production 37 Monkeys. Disney Branded Television. Disney Television Animation.

Creators Devin Bunje. Nick Stanton.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 4

Status On Going (2023–)
